attributes.action: allow the sale and ownership of handguns, rifles, and some military style weapons with the view of using them for self defence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Britain is under siege, with an increasing violent crime rate, whilst Americas, with a strong Republican Government supporting relaxed Gun control, is dropping. The Police do a fine job, however, until they can be on the scene of a violent crime all the time, before it happens, they are still ineffective. 
Give us the freedom given to us in the 1698 Bill of Rights...the right to bear arms.
